default.title: SHARE MY #DIGIPOWER DATA
default.description: With this form, you can register your consent, and optionally share additional data, in line with the SITRA #digipower contract.

default.title: WHICH DATA SHOULD BE SHARED?
default.description: Data underlying the following visualisations will be shared. Select all that you want to share.
additional: Whole file (which I will provide separately)

default.title: FOR WHAT PURPOSE?
default.description: On a strictly need-to-know basis, I consent to sharing this data for the following purposes. Select all that apply:
options: For help with producing screenshots, tweets, videos or summaries (add details below if needed)
Within my #digipower bubble, for drafting #digipower reports which I can approve/review later
Outside of my #digipower bubble, to improve the #digipower experience of other participants, in the precise ways defined below
To report a bug or issue with data extraction, display or visualisation
To help Hestia.AI developers to improve the data viewing experience

default.title: ADDITIONAL DETAILS & COMMENTS
default.description: If you have anything to add, please type it here:
default.placeholder: e.g. particular requirements about how the data should be handled (which data, what specific purpose, any sensitivities, who should/should not be able to access it).
